title: Ibuprofen, Acetaminophen and Dipyrone to Fever Control in Children

metadata.brief_title: Ibuprofen, Acetaminophen and Dipyrone to Fever Control in Children
metadata.inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 male and female children aged 06 months to 06 years old, weight above 5 kilo and axillary temperature above 37,5 celsius degree.
metadata.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the efficacy and tolerability of acetaminophen, dipyrone and ibuprofen to fever control in children.~For the efficacy asses were compared:~the time to start the action;~the action duration;~the difference between the basal temperature and the lower temperature in the study period.~For the tolerability asses all adverse events were recorded, as well as your intensity and the relation to the treatment.
